DefaultReaderConfiguration.fullDescription: Collects events from SmoothWall UTM appliances and software.

file.toolTipText: Directory or path to read from

string.toolTipText: Hostname of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

integer.toolTipText: Port number of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

select.toolTipText: Data routing (normalized alerts to Manager and/or raw data to nDepth)

integer.toolTipText: Number of seconds between log reads

FastFormatter.description: ICMP CODE Destination Network is Administratively Prohibited
FastFormatter.format: ICMP Destination Network is Administratively Prohibited

FastFormatter.description: ICMP CODE Destination Host is Administratively Prohibited
FastFormatter.format: ICMP Destination Host is Administratively Prohibited

FastFormatter.description: ICMP CODE Destination Network Unreachable for Service
FastFormatter.format: ICMP Destination Network Unreachable for Service

FastFormatter.description: ICMP CODE Destination Host Unreachable for Service
FastFormatter.format: ICMP Destination Host Unreachable for Service

FastFormatter.description: ICMP CODE Redirect for the Host
ICMP CODE Redirect for Service and Network
FastFormatter.format: ICMP Redirect for Service and Network

FastFormatter.description: ICMP CODE Redirect for Service and Host
FastFormatter.format: ICMP Redirect for Service and Host

FastFormatter.description: ICMP CODE Alternate Address for Host
ICMP CODE Time to Live exceeded in Transit
FastFormatter.format: ICMP Time to Live exceeded in Transit

FastFormatter.description: ICMP CODE Fragment Reassembly Time Exceeded
ICMP CODE Pointer indicates the error
ICMP CODE Missing a Required Option

FastPattern.description: ServiceWarning antispamd 1 Attempt at retrieving rules failed
FastPattern.pattern: antispamd\S+ Attempt at retrieving rules failed

FastPattern.description: UserAuthAudit authd 4 No group information found
ServiceInfo Guardian 1 Guardian update in progress
ServiceInfo Guardian 2 Guardian There is no incremental upgrade available for the current version
FastPattern.pattern: Guardian\S+ Guardian There is no incremental upgrade available for the current version

FastPattern.description: ServiceInfo Guardian 3 Guardian Switching to considering the full set from now
FastPattern.pattern: Guardian\S+ Guardian Switching to considering the full set from now

FastPattern.description: ServiceInfo Guardian 4 Guardian Comparing current version
ServiceInfo Guardian 5 Guardian Blocklists are currently up to date
FastPattern.pattern: Guardian\S+ Guardian Blocklists are currently up to date

FastPattern.description: SoftwareUpdate Guardian 6 Guardian Downloading blocklists from
ServiceInfo Guardian 7 Guardian Validating downloaded blocklists
SoftwareInstall Guardian 8 Guardian Installing new blocklists

FastFormatter.format: Install of "New Guardian blocklists" in progress

FastPattern.description: ServiceWarning Guardian 9 Unable to apply blocklists
ServiceWarning Guardian 10 Guardian Unable to apply blocklists
FastPattern.pattern: Guardian\S+ Guardian Unable to apply blocklists

FastPattern.description: ServiceWarning guardian3 1 Could not write to log file:
FastPattern.pattern: guardian3\S+ Could not write to log file:

FastPattern.description: ServiceWarning monitord 1 Incoming Traffic has exceeded
ServiceWarning monitord 2 Unable to open file
ServiceWarning postqueue 1 fatal: Queue report unavailable
ServiceInfo smoothd 2 (Starting|Stopping) ALL IDS Snort processes
FastPattern.pattern: smoothd\S+ St(?:opp|art)ing ALL IDS Snort processes

FastPattern.description: ServiceInfo smoothd 3 IDS Snort Process for: \S+ started
FastPattern.pattern: smoothd\S+ IDS Snort Process for: \S+ started

FastPattern.description: ProcessStop smoothd 6 Shutting down Timed function
ServiceWarning smoothd 10 Command "..." is already defined
ServiceInfo smoothd 12 Routing table has changed
ServiceInfo smoothd 13 Starting normal operations for client
FastPattern.pattern: smoothd\S+ Starting normal operations for client

FastPattern.description: SoftwareUpdate smoothd 14 Installing Intrusion Snort rules
ServiceWarning SmoothDClient 1 Unable to execute command
ServiceInfo smoothwall 7 (blocklist|intrusion)s already up to date
ServiceInfo smoothwall 8 Zone bridging rule added
ServiceInfo smoothwall 10 System clock successfully updated
ServiceWarning smoothwall 13 guardian3 scraper: Fatal database error
FastPattern.pattern: smoothwall\S+ guardian3 scraper: Fatal database error

FastPattern.description: ServiceWarning smoothwall 14 guardian3 scraper: Could not parse line
FastPattern.pattern: smoothwall\S+ guardian3 scraper: Could not parse line

FastPattern.description: ServiceInfo syslog-ng 1 Changing permissions on special file
FastPattern.pattern: syslog-ng\S+ Changing permissions on special file

FastPattern.description: ServiceInfo vipreupdater 1 VIPRE definitions already up to date
FastPattern.pattern: vipreupdater\S+ VIPRE definitions already up to date

FastPattern.description: ServiceInfo vipreupdater 2 Checking for VIPRE definitions updates...
FastPattern.pattern: vipreupdater\S+ Checking for VIPRE definitions updates...
